idea-plugin.name: Generate Crud
idea-plugin.description:
generate crud code based on entity classes

Please right-click to generate the class defined with the Entity annotation, and the following module will be generated :

  • Controller REST API with Swagger DOC API
  • DAO(JpaRepository)
  • DTO
  • Service (with page query)
  • Mapper mapstruct
  • Mockito Junit5 Unit Test

根据实体类生成原始代码 在带有@Entity注解的实体类上右键单击"Generator CRUD"，然后将生成以下模块: - Controller REST API with Swagger DOC API - DAO(字段校验) - DTO - Service (分页) - Mapper mapstruct - Mockito Junit5 Unit Test
